item.title: Partition the disks Arch Linux
item.description: [png261] lsblk NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINTS sdb 8:16 0 111.8G 0 disk ├─sdb1 8:17 0 300M 0 part /boot ├─sdb2 8:18 0 2G 0 part [SWAP] ├─sdb3 8:19 0 30G 0 part / └─sdb4 8:20 0 79.
